name: conjecture
description:
The invisible zombies have got you surrounded. You can't see them and there are hundreds of them coming. You're stuck by the wall and they're getting closer. You're a goner, but you can take some of them with you.

Audio Game made for "Games for Blind Gamers" game jam! This game is fully accesible for screen readers.

How to play:

"You're stationary and can rotate 180 degrees by moving the mouse to the right and left. You've hit the edge, when you hear a slight thud of touching the wall."

"You have a special gun that lets you hear zombies if you point it directly at them. The closer they are, the louder they moan. If you hear their heartbeat, regardless of whether you point at them or not, that means they're very close. Aim with your gun by moving the mouse right and left. You shoot by pressing Left Mouse Button when you point directly at zombie. A splash of gore means you have hit and killed one of them."

"The gun can only hold three bullets at a time. Bullets are in the crate on your right. Reload by pressing Right Mouse Button when you're touching the wall on the right."

"For alternative movement with keyboard use left and right arrows for rotating, up arrow to shoot and down arrow to reload. You can also use A and D for rotation, W for shooting and S for reloading."
